content: pirate s cove ©2016 hilary designs a criminal knits pattern materials 3 skeins ultra pima in 3 different colors or 3 skeins of worsted weight yarn 220yds each size 9 24 & 40 circular needles gauge 4 sts to the inch in garter stitch size 51 x 46 abbreviations c/o cast on b/o bind off k knit p purl kf&b knit into the front and the back of the same stitch 1 stitch made k2tog knit the next 2 stitches together yo yarn over mc main color cc1 2nd color cc2 3rd color pirate s cove©2016 hilary designs 1 write down which color is which before you start with mc c/o 5 knit 1 row next row kf&b k to end next row knit across section 1 still with mc work row 1 & 2 until you have 74 stitches on your needles this is a solid color garter section row 1 kf&b k to end row 2 knit across section 2 work row 1 & 2 alternating between cc1 and mc eight 8 times you will have eight 8 alternating color garter stripes at the end of this section section 3 the lace section work row 1 8 below seven 7 times lace repeats are shown in parenthesis with cc1 row 1 kf&b k to end row 2 knit across with cc2 row 3 kf&b k to end row 4 k1 k2tog yo to last 3 stitches k3 with cc1 row 5 kf&b k to end row 6 knit across with mc row 7 kf&b k to end row 8 k1 k2tog yo to last 3 stitches k3 pirate s cove©2016 hilary designs 2 section 4 work row 1 & 2 alternating between cc1 and cc2 eight 8 times note row 1 & 2 for the garter and lace sections are the same you will have eight 8 alternating color garter stripes at the end of this section work row 1 & 2 in cc1 once more section 5 with cc2 work row 1 & 2 fourteen 14 times or until you have just enough yarn to b/o with this is a solid color garter section the bind off still with cc2 bind off loosely if you re worried the b/o will be too tight use a needle 1 or 2 sizes larger to bind off with weave in all ends block or not and enjoy your pirate s cove pirate s cove©2016 hilary designs 3
